grid.sql: select l.id, l.kood, l.nimetus, $2::integer as userId, l.tun1, l.tun2, l.tun3, l.tun4, l.tun5 from libs.library l where l.library = 'MAKSUKOOD' and l.status <> 3

select.sql: select l.id, l.rekvid, l.kood, l.nimetus, l.status, l.library, l.muud, l.tun1, l.tun2, l.tun3. l.tun4. l.tun5 from libs.library l where l.id = $1
select.sqlAsNew:
select $1::integer as id , $2::integer as userid, 'MAKSUKOOD' as doc_type_id, null::text as kood, null::integer as rekvid, null::text as nimetus, 'PALK'::text as library, 0::integer as status, 0 as tun1, 0 as tun2, 0 as tun3, 0 as tun4, 0 as tun5,
null::text as muud

selectAsLibs.sql: select * from palk.com_maksukood l where (l.rekvId = $1 or l.rekvid is null)

deleteDoc.sql: select error_code, result, error_message from libs.sp_delete_library($1::integer, $2::integer)
